p: The SEM observation study was undertaken to know the effect of CMEO on the micro-morphological structure of macroconidia. The fungi were grown for 7 days on CD agar plates and 1 cm 2 of mycelia mat was collected and inoculated on to CD agar slides that contain MIC and MFC concentrations of CMEO and incubated for 7 days at 28°C. The fungi not treated with CMEO were control. Next, mycelia were fixed on conducting dual side carbon tape and coated with gold using a sputter coater (Emitech, model no.: SC7620) and dried out in CO 2 chamber. The micro-morphological structure of macroconidia was captured in an environmental mode under SEM (FEI, model no.: Quanta 200) at a magnification of 5000×.
